title: Wireless System Automation Development Engineer
summary: Do you have a passion for taking on big challenges? Do you love pushing the limits of what’s considered feasible? Join us and help build world-renowned wireless systems that connect customers to their world like never before.
description: In this technical role, you will be responsible for automation development and characterization of state-of-the-art wireless SoC products. You will develop the bringup infrastructure at the center of a silicon design group as well as the characterization, regression, and reporting framework.
key_qualifications: This is an individual technical contributor role that requires industry experience in integration, bringing up and productization of wireless communication systems...
education_experience: Minimum qualification is BS+ 3 years of relevant experience.
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role...
